name: BOB
description: BOB is a javascript library for building complex html structures
author: Stephan Nordnes Eriksen

scripts.standalone: cat app/scripts/BOB.coffee app/scripts/BOBChildArray.coffee | coffee --compile --stdio -b > public/BOB.standalone.js; uglifyjs public/BOB.standalone.js > public/BOB.standalone.min.js
scripts.compile: brunch build; npm run standalone; npm run uglifyjs
